channel.title: [Via Teamviewer] Whip Attack help needs fixing [PI]
channel.description:
Can someone help me via Teamviewer i got an error
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc453/DivineScapev1/bugged.png[/img]
the whip stays still like rolled up when u attack something or someone
Hello if u can do via teamviewer i will be very great full i have no idea how to do stuff like that

item.title: [Via Teamviewer] Whip Attack help needs fixing [PI]

item.description:

case 4151: // whip if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(341); } c.specAccuracy = 1.10; c.startAnimation(1658); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;code]
